ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "Egg salad made with Greek yogurt instead of mayo to cut calories without cutting flavor!"
ins:
Place eggs in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil, remove from heat, and let eggs stand in hot water for 15 minutes. Remove eggs from hot water, cool under cold running water, and peel.
Mash eggs in a bowl.
Stir avocado, onion, and parsley into the eggs.
Mix relish, yogurt, and mustard into egg mixture. Season with salt and black pepper.
